text: Estádio Germano Krüger, is a multi-purpose stadium in Ponta Grossa, Paraná, Brazil. Owned by Operário Ferroviário, it is currently used mostly for football matches. The stadium has a capacity of 10,632 people.Estádio do Operário passa por obras pra aumentar capacidade pra Série B; Tribuna PR, 12 November 2018 The stadium is named after Germano Krüger, a German engineer who was Operário's president and designed the stadium.Conheça a história de Germano Krüger, que foi homenageado com nome de estádio; G1, 30 January 2016 ==References== ==External links== *Stadium article at Operário.com Category:Operário Ferroviário Esporte Clube Category:Football venues in Paraná (state) Category:Multi-purpose stadiums in Brazil
title: Estádio Germano Krüger
